Title: The Family Hour
Plot: When Nicole Bailey, the ex-wife of a respected former senator, is found murdered and brutalised in her home, Green and Cassady look first at the senator, but follow the trail of clues to a dysfunctional family with a number of potentially embarrassing secrets. McCoy finds himself in the hot seat when he is forced to argue the case in front of a judge more interested in public relations than justice.
GuestStars: Mark Setlock, Erik Heger, Robin Galloway, Annika Boras, Kia Joy Goodwin, Allison Mackie, Jeffrey Tambor, Daryl Wein, Michael J. Reilly, Harry Hamlin, Peter O'Connor, Travis York, Postell Pringle, Jamison Stern, Je
